title: Fix award photos not displaying in Awards & Recognition section

requirements.summary: Fix the Awards & Recognition section on the About page so all 4 award photos render visibly with correct paths, dimensions, and no CSS hiding rules
acceptanceCriteria: All 4 award photos (award-photo-01.jpeg through award-photo-04.jpeg) are visible on the About page in the Awards & Recognition section
Each image src attribute is set to '/assets/generated/award-photo-XX.jpeg' (absolute path from public root)
Each image has a defined container height and object-fit: cover so images are not zero-sized
No CSS rule sets display:none, visibility:hidden, or height:0 on the award photo elements
Images load without 404 errors in the browser network tab

file_operations.description: Fix the Awards & Recognition section image rendering by ensuring each of the 4 award photo tags has: (1) a valid src attribute set to '/assets/generated/award-photo-01.jpeg' through '/assets/generated/award-photo-04.jpeg' (using absolute paths from public root), (2) descriptive alt text for each award, (3) an explicit container with defined height (e.g., h-48 or h-64) and object-fit: cover to prevent zero-sized images, and (4) no CSS classes or inline styles that set display:none, visibility:hidden, or height:0. Verify the static asset files exist at frontend/public/assets/generated/award-photo-01.jpeg through award-photo-04.jpeg before implementing.
